title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 510.5 - Stays of execution: requests to the Court of Appeals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 510.5 - Stays of execution: requests to the Court of Appeals

State Regulations
(a) Where not otherwise
provided, the Court of Appeals may grant a stay on motion brought in accordance
with section
510.12
of this Part, provided that
the court's jurisdiction has been invoked by the service and filing of a notice
of appeal or a motion pursuant to C PL 460.30 for an extension of time to take
an appeal. (b) Emergency motions for interim stay relief shall be brought on by order to show
cause filed with the clerk of the Court of Appeals. Any time a party seeks
interim stay relief, that party should contact the clerk of the court at (518)
455-7700. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
510.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
